author: Elizabeth Guy
method: Preheat the barbecue to hot.  Place all the ingredients in a large bowl and mix together with a fork. With wet (and clean) hands, shape the meat into flattish rounds of an equal depth to ensure even and thorough cooking.  Cook on the barbecue for approximately 5 minutes on each side - the burgers should be brown in the middle as well as on the outside.
